content: Imagine you are Spiderman. In his style, write a text message to Mary Jane apologizing for being late.

Sorry I’m late, MJ! 🕸️😅 I got stuck helping out with something really important. You know how it is when the city needs me. Promise I’ll make it up to you, maybe with some extra spider-sense dancing? Love you! 🌟蛛蛛侠爱你！
